trans-unit.source: Creates a new directory with the attributes of a specified template directory

seg-source.mrk: Creates a new directory with the attributes of a specified template directory

target.mrk: Creates a new directory with the attributes of a specified template directory

trans-unit.source: The path of the directory to be created.

seg-source.mrk: The path of the directory to be created.

target.mrk: The path of the directory to be created.

trans-unit.source: The path of the directory to use as a template when creating the new directory.

seg-source.mrk: The path of the directory to use as a template when creating the new directory.

target.mrk: The path of the directory to use as a template when creating the new directory.

trans-unit.source: [optional] $tagSECURITY_ATTRIBUTES structure that specifies a security descriptor for the new directory.

seg-source.mrk: $tagSECURITY_ATTRIBUTES structure that specifies a security descriptor for the new directory.

target.mrk: $tagSECURITY_ATTRIBUTES structure that specifies a security descriptor for the new directory.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is 0 (Default), the directory gets a default security descriptor.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is 0 (Default), the directory gets a default security descriptor.

target.mrk: If this parameter is 0 (Default), the directory gets a default security descriptor.

trans-unit.source: The ACL in the default security descriptor for a directory are inherited from its parent directory.

seg-source.mrk: The ACL in the default security descriptor for a directory are inherited from its parent directory.

target.mrk: The ACL in the default security descriptor for a directory are inherited from its parent directory.

trans-unit.source: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information

seg-source.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information

target.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_CreateDirectoryEx() function allows you to create directories that inherit stream information from other directories.

seg-source.mrk: The _WinAPI_CreateDirectoryEx() function allows you to create directories that inherit stream information from other directories.

target.mrk: The _WinAPI_CreateDirectoryEx() function allows you to create directories that inherit stream information from other directories.

trans-unit.source: This function is useful, for example, when you are using Macintosh directories, which have a resource stream that is needed to properly identify directory contents as an attribute.

seg-source.mrk: This function is useful, for example, when you are using Macintosh directories, which have a resource stream that is needed to properly identify directory contents as an attribute.

target.mrk: This function is useful, for example, when you are using Macintosh directories, which have a resource stream that is needed to properly identify directory contents as an attribute.
